body_html:
You can turn on verbose logging in the AWS C++ SDK to get us more information.
And also like @JonathanHenson already mentioned, it's likely that you need to turn off virtual addressing.

Here's a sample:

Aws::SDKOptions options;
options.loggingOptions.logLevel = Aws::Utils::Logging::LogLevel::Trace;
Aws::InitAPI(options);

S3Client client (Aws::Client::ClientConfiguration(), 
                          Aws::Client::AWSAuthV4Signer::PayloadSigningPolicy::Never, 
                          false /*useVirtualAdressing*/);
// ...

Note, that the errors you reported have nothing to do with compiler version.

more information about S3 virtual addressing can be found here
